Text:
Keep it up!! Thanks.
I love the schlock!!

lol   yessir! SCHLOCK you got!

Enjoy!

Now this is a favourite!
First of all, it's got Luciana Paluzzi! And that's real quality (think James Bond Thunderball).
The rest of the quality is genuine schlock! The effects are spectacularly unspectacular, and the acting is, shall we say, not spectacular. And the monsters! Daleks whithout protruding bits, but with tentacles and some strange greenish skin.
I Like It!

@Fruster

Well now Ive seen plenty of schlock, but I gotta tell ya.  I agree completely with ya man.  They really dont get much worse than this.  

Thats why its so good!!

Thanks and enjoy!!
